title: What are the documents required to Rent a Car in Dubai and anywhere in UAE?
text: If you are a UAE resident, you are required to submit: Copy of Passport Emirates ID Valid UAE Driving License If you are a Tourist visiting the UAE, you need to submit : Passport Visit Visa International Driving Permit

title: List of Countries which driving license allowed to drive in UAE?
text: Australia, Austria, Bahrain, Belgium, Brazil, Canada (Quebec*), China, Croatia, Cyprus, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Great Britain, Greece, Hong Kong, Ireland, Italy, Japan, Kuwait, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Malaysia, Netherland, New Zealand, Norway, Oman, Poland, Portugal, Qatar, Romania, Saudi Arabia, Singapore, Slovakia, Slovenia, South Africa, South Korea, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, Turkey, USA.

title: If a problem arises with my vehicle, what do I do?
text: For instance, if any problem arises with your car, turn off the engine and do not hesitate to contact our customer care as soon as possible. They will assist you in replacing the car reliably.

title: Do you deliver the Car?
text: For instance, if any problem arises with your car, turn off the engine and do not hesitate to contact our customer care as soon as possible. They will assist you in replacing the car reliably.
